'''Guiding Breeze''' is [[Jean]]'s [[Utility Passive]].

==Gameplay Notes==
* If this talent activates while Jean cooks [[Mushroom Pizza]], it is possible to double the amount of her special dish, [[Invigorating Pizza]].
{{Talents by Category List|Perfect Recovery Dish Cooking Talents|header=identical|nottitle=Guiding Breeze}}
